response.original_title: Power, Lies & Corruption: The Hoffa Disappearance
response.overview: Venture into the heart of one of the most captivating mysteries in American history. Hoffa's story spans decades of intrigue, power plays and the labyrinthine underworld of organised crime. Witness Jimmy Hoffa's relentless pursuit of power, alongside his tumultuous relationship with the federal government. This labour leaders fierce dedication to his cause brought him incredible respect from the masses, but also brought danger to his door. What really happened to James Riddle Hoffa.
response.title: Power, Lies & Corruption: The Hoffa Disappearance
